text: allah adahas kara tibune nam, oba siyallanvama ekama (dharmayak adahana) samuhayak bavata pat karannata ida tibuni. ehet (ohu) taman adahas kala ayava, (ovunge papayanhi hetuven) væradi margayehi athæra damanneya. taman adahas karana ayava, (ovunge parisuddhabhavaye hetuven) rju margayehi ætulu karanneya. oba karamin siti kriyavan gæna niyata vasayenma oba (viniscaya dinadi) prasna karanu labannehuya
